job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Looking for an Embedded Software Engineer who will be developing code for new electric vehicles.</p><p><br></p><p>Candidates must have a strong background in Automotive or Electric Vehicle industry to be considered for this role.</p><p><br></p><p>Skills/Experience Required:</p><p><br></p><p>· 5+ years experience in the automotive / EV industry</p><p>· C++, Python</p><p>· Coding for Software, Firmware or hardware applications</p><p>· understanding of BMS or Inverters</p><p>· Hands-on</p><p>· B.S. or higher in technical field</p>
